name: Quest of Quests
description:
Quest of Quests is the final assignment of the SAE Game Design course.

Quest of Quests is a simple interactive fiction game, where you follow Sam, an ispiring game designer, on his quest to the... quest that will land him his dream job.

To accomplish that, he will have to fight his own creation, inside his own nightmare.
(That pretty much sums up exactly what I had to endure in order to finish this course)

Will he prevail? Or will he perish and lose the job forever?
